DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim evaluate effect insole foot arthritis .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , control , double-blind , prospective trial conduct involve 80 patient rheumatoid arthritis , accord American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criterion , foot pain , select outpatient clinic - Federal University Sao Paulo ( UNIFESP ) . Patients randomize two group : experimental ( 40 ) control ( 40 ) . The experimental group use ethyl-vinyl acetate ( EVA ) foot orthoses , support retrocapital support medial arch ( insole intervention ) . The control group use material flat insole ( insole placebo ) .
